title: signup failed, whoops
body: I'm tryiong to make an acc for my friend and the username is FootBanana92 and it says signup has failed twice can someone make the acc for me I became a noob sept 14 2015

replies.body:
If someone else makes your account, there's a good chance of them possibly stealing it or messing with it in the future since they'll have the username and password =\ . I'd suggest making that account on your own and not sharing the details.

Is this a normal or PBE account you're trying to make? You may have a bit better luck if you try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).

@LokiiLox Had the exact same problem!
@BROPORO That actually helped me, much appreciated!{{summoner:1}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
